version_description:
What's new in version 6.1.1
• Stability improvements and bug fixes
What's new in version 6.0.0
• New app icon! Look for a blue chat bubble with a white video camera in the center
• Live voice messages - tap the mic icon and speak your mind. Your voice message will be streamed live.
• Redesigned content creation bar
• Download your videos directly to your phone
• New sound for notifications
• Long-press on a contact's picture to send a message
• Improvements to Apple Watch app including video playback speed and quality

What's new in version 6.1.2
• More stability improvements and bug fixes
